hanno.examples.wikipedia
Class WikipediaStateMachine

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.commons.scxml.env.AbstractStateMachine
      hanno.engine.HannoStateMachine
          hanno.examples.wikipedia.WikipediaStateMachine

public class WikipediaStateMachine
extends HannoStateMachine

Example state machine -- navigates links on the Wikipedia site

1.0
Author:
Chris Struble
